attributes.action: changing facilities for  disabled at hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask the PM to make sure all hospitals have changing facilities for the severely disabled. 
These facilities should have a bed and hoist to make it easier for carers and more comfortable for the disabled person.
Surely its against human rights for a disabled person to be changed on the floor of a public toilet.
